title: Himi 61
lyrics:
4-6s & 2-8s
1.
Ke tau fiefia
Pea fakafeta’i,
Kuo toki ‘alu
Hotau toko taha
Kuo hiki atu ia
Ki he maama ‘i ‘olunga.
2.
Kuo mu’omu’a
‘A hotau kāinga,
Ki he nofo’anga
‘O hotau ‘Otua;
Pea kuo lī ki mui
‘A hono ngaahi kāinga.
3.
Kuo ne ‘auhia
‘A e ngaahi afā
Pea tu’u ki ‘uta
‘O fiemālie
‘I he nofo’anga lelei
‘Oku tau kei kumi ki ai.
4.
Pea kuo hoko
‘E hotau kāinga,
Ki he nima ‘ofa
‘O hono ‘Otua;
Ko ho tau mālōlō’anga
‘Oku tau feinga ke tau ma’u.
5.
Pea kuo hao ‘a hotau kāinga,
Mei he pōpula
Mo e manavahē;
Pea kuo lava ia
Ki hono mālōlō’anga. *
